sports.title: Sport et Games
content: The campground offers you a variety of opportunities for sport and games. Both on one’s own initiative and invited by the Lestaubière team (daily at highseason).
You will find available a multi sporting field (artificial grass), a beach-volleyball field and 2 (illuminated) “jeu-de-boules” courts and of course a table-tennis table.
Our small gaming hall offers also some all weather facilities, including again a table-tennis table and a airhockey game.
Our lake is waiting for the fishermen amongst you. Fishing competitions are organized regularly.
In the neighborhood of Lestaubière you’ll find:
list: A tennis court (in the village at 500 m.)
Six golf courts are at your service, where is “Marterie” (18 holes) at 20 minutes distance.

swimming.title: Swimming
list: A swimming pool with separate toddler’s pool and sun lawn.
A swimming lake with sun lawn and small child’s beach. In the lake is a wooden platform for more fun.

animation.title: Animation
content: Animation activities by the Lestaubière team are organised during the season period only.
Every morning the youngest children are invited for some games, to play around or any other sportive activity.
A weekly returning activity is the children’s and teenager’s disco (dancing and gaming).

But also a variety of bigger events take place. Think about a lantern parade, mini-play-back show, music quiz, ghost’s tour, foxhound, animal sounds game, world championship “bommetje”, and tournaments for the typical campsite sports.
A dedicated place for the older youth is available in order to let them exchange their minds in an undisturbed way. A campfire is possible here (under supervision).
